div.p: This optional attribute is attached to a number of tags in the BIOGRAPHY section of entries: POLITICALAFFILIATION, JOB, SEXUALIDENTITY, GENDERIDENTITY, DENOMINATION, NATIONALITY, and NATIONALHERRITAGE. It allows you to capture changes in terminology over time. The older name in your prose (Sappphic, Deist, amanuensis) may not be familiar to your readers or helpful for indexing purposes; it may therefore need explanation. There are no values associated with this attribute; rather, you should type in the current alternative name as you understand it.

div.codeblock: <DENOMINATION CURRENTALTERNATIVETERM="Agnostic">did not subscribe to any formal religion</DENOMINATION>
